articles.title: Vivo V20 Pro will cost INR 29,990 ($405) in India, coming on December 2 - Gizchina.com
articles.description: Vivo V20 Pro will go official in India on December 2. However, several retailers already list the device with a starting price of INR 29,990 ($405).
articles.content: A couple of months ago, Vivo unveiled the Vivo V20 and Vivo V20 SE in India. Now, the company is gearing up to launch the Vivo V20 Pro variant in the country. After teasing it as “coming soon”, the c… [+2282 chars]

articles.title: People Are Realizing Tyler, The Creator Is the Voice of a Random Person on Grand Theft Auto V - XXLMAG.COM
articles.description: People on social media are realizing that Tyler, The Creator is the voice of a random person in the Grand Theft Auto V video game, which dropped back in 2013.
articles.content:
Tyler, The Creator added video game voice talent to his résumé some years back, but it looks like people are just beginning to notice.
On Nov. 28, footage featuring Tyler's voice from the nearly 10-… [+1984 chars]
